column1: 2316|11.16 p.m.|But I couldn't get out of the house straightaway because he would see me
column2:
so I would have to wait until he was asleep.
The time was 11.16 p.m.
I tried doubling 2s again
column3: but I couldn't get past 2(15) which was 32
column4: 768. So I groaned to make the time pass quicker and not think.
